name: ATODAN - Gameplaytest
description:
ATTENTION:  This is the Gametest-Version of A Tale Of Night And Day
If you want to play the GameJam-Version (wich has some bugs in it that are fixed here), go to https://karrastheraven.itch.io/a-tale-of-day-and-night 

IMPORTANT

It may be possible that you can only play the game once due to variable-issues. I had this bug one time but didn't find a solution or could repicate it, but as far as I could see, it destroyed the whole tutorial-area of the game. Maybe it can be fixed with a restart, but I'm not sure about that. Will be patched as soon as I find the reason for this behavior.

Name of the game: A Tale of Day and Night

How to play: Use your mouse and click on things. You can interact with things with your left mouse button and scroll through your actions with the right mouse button.

Goal: Interact with the world, solve small puzzles and enjoy the story based on a myth about Sun and Moon
Core Concept: Our Game is a Point & Click Adventure where you have to Retell a Tale, based on a Myth. The Myth addresses certain social categories, which the Player can experience and learn from. It's planed the world is planed to have some mini-games, but in the current version, those aren't implemented.
